Package org.github.fussel178.telestion.extension.corfu.generator.generator

public interface GeneratorFilesystem

  • Method Details

    • writeFile

      void writeFile​(Path filePath, String content) throws IOException
      Writes a new file to the given file path with the given content. Non-existent folders on the file path are generated automatically. Any existing file or folder is overridden during this operation.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the new file
      content - the new content the file should have
      Throws:
      IOException - gets thrown when errors happen during filesystem operations

    • writeFile

      default void writeFile​(Rendering rendering) throws IOException
      Writes a new file to the given file path with the given content. Non-existent folders on the file path are generated automatically. Any existing file or folder is overridden during this operation.
      Parameters:
      rendering - the rendering from a template engine
      Throws:
      IOException - gets thrown when errors happen during filesystem operations

    • delete

      void delete​(Path path) throws IOException
      Deletes a file or directory recursively.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file or directory that should be deleted.
      Throws:
      IOException - gets thrown when errors happen during filesystem operations
